Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: TC
Reviews.Content: 1 of 20 was defective and don't place well in close spacing such as back of dvr camera system. Not the end of the world. Would probably buy again untill I find something better.

ProductInfo.Name: (20) Pieces of 1 Channel Passive CCTV Camera BNC Video Balun Transceiver for Security Camera System - BNC to UTP CAT5 2000ft transmission. Saves 20% on wire.
